CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: enable_flag
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies whether MBDRC is enabled.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: num_bands
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of bands.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: limiter_threshold
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Threshold#[ #] in decibels for the limiter output. Range: -72 to 18dB, Default:0.22dB

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: limiter_makeup_gain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Makeup#[ #] gain in decibels for the limiter output. Range: -42 to 42 dB, Default:0 dB

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: limiter_gc
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Limiter gain#[ #] recovery coefficient. Range: 0.5 to 0.99 , Default:0.99

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: limiter_delay
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Limiter delay#[ #] in seconds. Range: 0 to 10 seconds. Default 0.008 seconds

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: limiter_max_wait
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Maximum#[ #] limiter waiting time in seconds.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: subband_drc
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description:
Following#[ #] this structure is the sub-band payload, This sub-band structure must be repeated for each band. After this DRC structure is configured for valid#[ #] bands, the next MBDRC setparams expects the sequence of sub-band MBDRC filter coefficients (the length depends on the number of bands) plus the#[ #] mute flag for that band plus uint16 padding.

The sequence is as follows:
- 1 band = 0 FIR coefficient + 1 mute flag + uint16 padding 
- 2#[ #] bands = 97 FIR coefficients + 2 mute flags + uint16 padding 
- 3 bands = 97+33 FIR coefficients + 3 mute flags + uint16 padding 
- 4 bands =#[ #] 97+33+33 FIR coefficients + 4 mute flags + uint16 padding 
- 5 bands = 97+33+33+33 FIR coefficients + 5 mute flags + uint16 padding 

For#[ #] improved filterbank, the sequence is as follows:
- 1 band = 0 FIR coefficient + 1 mute flag + uint16 padding 
- 2 bands = 141 FIR coefficients +#[ #] 2 mute flags + uint16 padding 
- 3 bands = 141+81 FIR coefficients + 3 mute flags + uint16 padding 
- 4 bands = 141+81+61 FIR coefficients + 4#[ #] mute flags + uint16 padding 
- 5 bands = 141+81+61+61 FIR coefficients + 5 mute flags + uint16 padding

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: firFilter
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: fir filter

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: padding
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Padding to align the structure to 4byte boundary

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: drc_stereo_linked_flag
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies whether all stereo channels have the same applied dynamics or if they process their dynamics independently.

RANGE.name: Not linked,channels process the dynamics independently
Linked,channels have the same applied dynamics

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: drc_mode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies whether#[ #] DRC mode is bypassed for subbands.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: drc_down_sample_level
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: DRC down#[ #] sample level.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: drc_delay
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: DRC delay in samples.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: drc_rms_time_avg_const
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: RMS signal energy time-averaging constant.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: drc_makeup_gain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: DRC makeup gain in decibels.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: down_expdr_threshold
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Down#[ #] expander threshold.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: down_expdr_slope
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Down#[ #] expander slope.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: down_expdr_attack
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Down expander attack constant.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: down_expdr_release
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Down expander release constant.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: down_expdr_hysteresis
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Down expander hysteresis constant.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Clients must set this field to 0.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: down_expdr_min_gain_db
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Down expander minimum gain.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: up_cmpsr_threshold
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Up#[ #] compressor threshold. Its value must be: (>down_expdr_threshold) && (<down_cmpsr_threshold)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: up_cmpsr_slope
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Up compressor slope.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: up_cmpsr_attack
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Up compressor attack constant.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: up_cmpsr_release
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Up compressor release constant.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: up_cmpsr_hysteresis
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Up compressor hysteresis constant.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: down_cmpsr_threshold
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Down#[ #] compressor threshold. Its value must be: (>up_cmpsr_threshold)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: down_cmpsr_slope
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Down compressor slope.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: reserved1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Clients must set this field to 0.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: down_cmpsr_attack
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Down compressor attack constant.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: down_cmpsr_release
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Down compressor release constant.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: down_cmpsr_hysteresis
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Down compressor hysteresis constant.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: reserved2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Clients must set this field to 0.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: subband_drc
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description:
Following#[ #] this structure is the sub-band payload, This sub-band structure must be repeated for each band. After this DRC structure is configured for valid#[ #] bands, the next MBDRC setparams expects the sequence of sub-band MBDRC filter coefficients (the length depends on the number of bands) plus the#[ #] mute flag for that band plus uint16 padding.

The sequence is as follows:
- 1 band = 0 FIR coefficient + 1 mute flag + uint16 padding 
- 2#[ #] bands = 97 FIR coefficients + 2 mute flags + uint16 padding 
- 3 bands = 97+33 FIR coefficients + 3 mute flags + uint16 padding 
- 4 bands =#[ #] 97+33+33 FIR coefficients + 4 mute flags + uint16 padding 
- 5 bands = 97+33+33+33 FIR coefficients + 5 mute flags + uint16 padding 

For#[ #] improved filterbank, the sequence is as follows:
- 1 band = 0 FIR coefficient + 1 mute flag + uint16 padding 
- 2 bands = 141 FIR coefficients +#[ #] 2 mute flags + uint16 padding 
- 3 bands = 141+81 FIR coefficients + 3 mute flags + uint16 padding 
- 4 bands = 141+81+61 FIR coefficients + 4#[ #] mute flags + uint16 padding 
- 5 bands = 141+81+61+61 FIR coefficients + 5 mute flags + uint16 padding

MODULE.name: AUDPROC_MODULE_ID_MBDRCV3
MODULE.description: Mutliband Dynamic Range Control Module V3

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: enable_flag
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies whether MBDRC is enabled.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: num_bands
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of bands.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: limiter_threshold
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Threshold#[ #] in decibels for the limiter output. Range: -72 to 18dB, Default:0.22dB

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: limiter_makeup_gain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Makeup#[ #] gain in decibels for the limiter output. Range: -42 to 42 dB, Default:0 dB

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: limiter_gc
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Limiter gain#[ #] recovery coefficient. Range:0.5 to 0.99, Default:0.99

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: limiter_delay
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Limiter delay#[ #] in seconds. Range:0 to 10, Default:0.008 seconds

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: limiter_max_wait
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Maximum#[ #] limiter waiting time in seconds. Range:0 to 10, Default:0.008 seconds

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: fir_filter_length
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: MBDRC_V3 FIR split filter length.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Must be set to 0.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: subband_drc
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description:
Following this structure is the sub-band payload, This sub-band structure must be repeated for each band. After this DRC structure is#[ #] configured for valid bands, the next MBDRC setparams expects the sequence of sub-band MBDRC filter coefficients (the length depends on the number#[ #] of bands) plus the mute flag for that band plus uint16 padding. 

The sequence is as follows:
- 1 band = 0 FIR coefficient + 1 mute flag +#[ #] uint16 padding 
- 2 bands = 97 FIR coefficients + 2 mute flags + uint16 padding 
- 3 bands = 97+33 FIR coefficients + 3 mute flags + uint16#[ #] padding 
- 4 bands = 97+33+33 FIR coefficients + 4 mute flags + uint16 padding 
- 5 bands = 97+33+33+33 FIR coefficients + 5 mute flags + uint16#[ #] padding 

For improved filterbank, the sequence is as follows:
- 1 band = 0 FIR coefficient + 1 mute flag + uint16 padding 
- 2 bands = 141#[ #] FIR coefficients + 2 mute flags + uint16 padding 
- 3 bands = 141+81 FIR coefficients + 3 mute flags + uint16 padding 
- 4 bands = 141+81+61 FIR#[ #] coefficients + 4 mute flags + uint16 padding 
- 5 bands = 141+81+61+61 FIR coefficients + 5 mute flags + uint16 padding

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: firFilter
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: fir filter

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: padding
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Padding to align the structure to 4byte boundary

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: filter_xover_freqs
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Array of filter crossover frequencies. Based on Band number n, filter_xover_freqs[MBDRC_MAX_BANDS-1] has#[ #] (n-1) crossover frequecies and the rest(if any) are ignored.

MODULE.name: VOICE_MODULE_MBDRC
MODULE.description:
Multiband Dynamic Range Control (MBDRC) algorithm in the voice#[ #] processor on the Rx path.
This module supports the following parameter IDs
VOICE_PARAM_MOD_ENABLE
VOICE_PARAM_MBDRC

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables/disables this feature

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client should set this field to zero.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_MBDRC
PARAMETER.description:
Multiband dynamic range control (MBDRC) algorithm.
Fixed size for this#[ #] parameter Version 0 -- 12 bytes, followed by variable size DRC and FIR filter structures 
The filter sizes are defined by configurable parameters.#[ #] The maximum size for voice applications is 472 bytes. For voice, the maximum number of bands is assumed to be 3.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: usNumBands
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of bands.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sLimThreshold
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Threshold in dB to limit peaks.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sLimMakeupGain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Makeup gain in dB to increase overall signal level after peak limiting.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sLimGc
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Gain recovery constant. Controls how fast or slow the gain change should recover; a high value implies slower recovery

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sLimDelay
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Delay buffer length in ms

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sLimMaxWait
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Maximum window size in ms, not used when delay is set to a nonzero value.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client should set this field as zero

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sDrcStereoLinked
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Options to#[ #] process stereo signal with: Linked DRC “ All stereo channels have the same applied dynamics, Unlinked DRC “ Stereo channels process their#[ #] dynamics independently.

RANGE.name: Not linked,channels process the dynamics independently
Linked,channels have the same applied dynamics

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sDrcMode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Bypasses DRC for#[ #] subbands.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sDrcDownSampleLevel
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Update DRC#[ #] gain every this number of samples instead of every sample.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sDrcDelay
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Delay on the signal#[ #] path in each subband DRC to apply gain.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: usDrcRmsTav
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Time-averaging constant for computing energy.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: usMakeupGain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Makeup gain in dB applied after DRC

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sDnExpaThresholdL
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Downward#[ #] expander threshold in dB.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sDnExpaSlopeL
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Down expander#[ #] slope.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ulDnExpaAttack
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Downward expander gain smooth attack time in ms

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ulDnExpaRelease
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Downward expander gain smooth release time in ms.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: usDnExpaHysterisis
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Downward expander gain smooth release time in ms.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: usReserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Clients must set this field to 0.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ulDnExpaMinGainDB
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Downward expander minimum gain in dB

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sUpCompThreshold
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Up#[ #] compressor threshold. Its value must be: (>down_expdr_threshold) && (<down_cmpsr_threshold)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sUpCompSlope
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Up compressor slope.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ulUpCompAttack
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Upward compressor dynamic gain smooth attack time in ms.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ulUpCompRelease
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Upward compressor dynamic gain smooth release time in ms.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: usUpCompHysterisis
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Upward compressor gain hysteresis in dB on the release side to avoid gain fluctuations.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sDnCompThreshold
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Downward#[ #] compressor threshold in dB. Its value must be: (>up_cmpsr_threshold)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sDnCompSlope
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Downward compression slope.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: usReserved1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Clients must set this field to 0.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ulDnCompAttack
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Downward compressor dynamic gain smooth attack time in ms.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ulDnCompRelease
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Downward compressor dynamic gain smooth release time in ms.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: usDnCompHysterisis
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Downward compressor gain hysteresis in dB on release side to avoid gain fluctuation.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: usReserved2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Clients must set this field to 0.

MODULE.name: VOICE_MODULE_MBDRC_V2
MODULE.description:
Multiband Dynamic Range Control (MBDRC) algorithm in the voice#[ #] processor on the Rx path. This module provides the following features:
Calibration for up to five bands
Sampling rates NB, WB, SWB, FB
Higher order#[ #] FIR filter for SWB and FB sampling rates

This module supports the following parameter#[ #] IDs:
VOICE_PARAM_MOD_ENABLE
VOICE_PARAM_MBDRC_V2
VOICE_PARAM_MBDRC_FILTER_XOVER_FREQ

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables/disables this feature

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client should set this field to zero.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_MBDRC_V2
PARAMETER.description:
MBDRC version 2 algorithm, which supports the following#[ #] features
Calibration for up to five bands
NB, WB, SWB, and FB sampling rates
Higher order FIR filter for SWB and FB sampling rates (up to 48 kHz#[ #] processing)
The fixed size for this parameter is dynamic based on the number of bands and the FIR filter length, which depends on the sampling rate#[ #] (8 kHz, 16 kHz, 32 kHz, or 48 kHz).
In the following table, the parameters in bold correspond to sub-band DRC configuration, which is repeated#[ #] based on the number of bands (usNumBands).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: usNumBands
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of bands.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sLimThreshold
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Threshold in dB to limit peaks.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sLimMakeupGain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Makeup gain in dB to increase overall signal level after peak limiting.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sLimGc
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Gain recovery constant. Controls how fast or slow the gain change should recover; a high value implies slower recovery

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sLimDelay
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Delay buffer length in ms

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sLimMaxWait
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Maximum window size in ms, not used when delay is set to a nonzero value.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: filterlength
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description:
The filterlength variable is hard coded based on the number of bands and voice sampling rates.

Depending on the number of bands#[ #] filterlength variable changes (when sampling rates is less than 32 kHz) 
 : - 1 Band : 0 
- 2 Bands : 97c
- 3 Bands : 130 (97 + 33) 
- 4#[ #] Bands : 163 (97 + 33 + 33) 
- 5 Bands : 196 (97 + 33 + 33 + 33) 

Depending on the number of bands filterlength variable changes (when sampling#[ #] rates is less than 32 kHz) 
 : - 1 Band : 0 
- 2 Bands : 141 
- 3 Bands : 222 (141 + 81) 
- 4 Bands : 283 (141 + 81 + 61) 
- 5 Bands : 344#[ #] (141 + 81 + 61 + 61)

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_MBDRC_FILTER_XOVER_FREQ
PARAMETER.description:
Monitors the MBDRC filter crossover frequencies for#[ #] different sub-bands.
Fixed size for this parameter
Version 0 -- 16 bytes for five bands

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: filter_xover_freqs
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Array of filter crossover frequencies

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sDrcStereoLinked
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Options to#[ #] process stereo signal with: Linked DRC “ All stereo channels have the same applied dynamics, Unlinked DRC “ Stereo channels process their#[ #] dynamics independently.

RANGE.name: Not linked,channels process the dynamics independently
Linked,channels have the same applied dynamics

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sDrcMode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Bypasses DRC for#[ #] subbands.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sDrcDownSampleLevel
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Update DRC#[ #] gain every this number of samples instead of every sample.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sDrcDelay
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Delay on the signal#[ #] path in each subband DRC to apply gain.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: usDrcRmsTav
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Time-averaging constant for computing energy.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: usMakeupGain
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Makeup gain in dB applied after DRC

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sDnExpaThresholdL
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Downward#[ #] expander threshold in dB.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sDnExpaSlopeL
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Down expander#[ #] slope.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ulDnExpaAttack
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Downward expander gain smooth attack time in ms

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ulDnExpaRelease
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Downward expander gain smooth release time in ms.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: usDnExpaHysterisis
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Downward expander gain smooth release time in ms.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: usReserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Clients must set this field to 0.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ulDnExpaMinGainDB
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Downward expander minimum gain in dB

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sUpCompThreshold
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Up#[ #] compressor threshold. Its value must be: (>down_expdr_threshold) && (<down_cmpsr_threshold)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sUpCompSlope
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Up compressor slope.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ulUpCompAttack
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Upward compressor dynamic gain smooth attack time in ms.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ulUpCompRelease
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Upward compressor dynamic gain smooth release time in ms.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: usUpCompHysterisis
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Upward compressor gain hysteresis in dB on the release side to avoid gain fluctuations.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sDnCompThreshold
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Downward compressor threshold in dB. Its value must be: (>up_cmpsr_threshold)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sDnCompSlope
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Downward compression slope.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: usReserved1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Clients must set this field to 0.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ulDnCompAttack
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Downward compressor dynamic gain smooth attack time in ms.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ulDnCompRelease
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Downward compressor dynamic gain smooth release time in ms.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: usDnCompHysterisis
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Downward compressor gain hysteresis in dB on release side to avoid gain fluctuation.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: usReserved2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Clients must set this field to 0.
